subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: It is only fitting that as Mississippi prepares to play Texas Tech in the Cotton Bowl, one of the linchpins behind the Rebels’ storybook turnaround is a literary star himself.
snippet: It is only fitting that as Mississippi prepares to play Texas Tech in the Cotton Bowl, one of the linchpins behind the Rebels’ storybook turnaround is a literary star himself.
